verses.verse: Why <S%H1984>boast<s%> you yourself in <S%H7451>mischief<s%>, O <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H2617>man<s%>? The goodness of <S%H410>God<s%> endures <S%H3117>continually<s%>.
You <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> more than <S%H2896>good<s%>; and <S%H8267>lying<s%> rather than to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

<S%H410>God<s%> shall likewise <S%H5422>destroy<s%> you for <S%H5331>ever<s%>, he shall take you <S%H2846>away<s%>, and pluck you <S%H5255>out<s%> of your living <S%H168>place<s%>, and root you <S%H8327>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> also shall <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and shall laugh at <S%H7832>him<s%>:

<S%H1397>Behold<s%>, this is the man that <S%H7760>made<s%> not <S%H430>God<s%> his <S%H4581>strength<s%>; but <S%H982>trusted<s%> in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of his <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> himself in his <S%H1942>wickedness<s%>.

But I am like a <S%H7488>green<s%> olive <S%H2132>tree<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: I <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, because you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6960>it<s%>: and I will wait on your <S%H8034>name<s%>; for it is <S%H2896>good<s%> before your <S%H2623>saints<s%>.
